languages.text: Из уединенной глуши Фолстоун обратился в духовный центр Простора, облаченный в золото и власть. Правители прибывали сюда за благословением на великие дела, грешники — за епитимьей, а праведники — за побуждением на духовный подвиг, и не было им конца.

No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.
languages.original_text: Из уединенной глуши Фолстоун обратился в духовный центр Простора, облаченный в золото и власть. Правители прибывали сюда за благословением на великие дела, грешники — за епитимьей, а праведники — за побуждением на духовный подвиг, и не было им конца.

traits.locale_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers came here to be anointed for greatness, sinners for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers came here to be anointed for greatness, sinners for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, sinners for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, sinners for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

languages.text: 荒寂岩地不再世隔绝，也不再孤独，而是成为了科罗努斯扩区的信仰中心，聚集了无数财富与力量。罪人到那里进行赎罪，正义之人到那里进行朝圣，而众多统治者到那里接受祝福，成为响当当的大人物。前往荒寂岩地的朝圣队伍一眼望不到头。
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: 荒寂岩地不再世隔绝，也不再孤独，而是成为了科罗努斯扩区的信仰中心，聚集了无数财富与力量。罪人到那里进行赎罪，正义之人到那里进行朝圣，而众多统治者到那里接受祝福，成为响当当的大人物。前往荒寂岩地的朝圣队伍一眼望不到头。

languages.text: 閑散としてうらぶれていたファウルストーンは、今や黄金と力に包まれ、エクスパンスの精神的中心地となった。支配者達は偉大な存在となるために、犯罪者は贖罪のために、そして公正な者達は勇気を得るためにそこを訪れた。そういった者たちの訪問に、終わりは見えなかった。
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: 閑散としてうらぶれていたファウルストーンは、今や黄金と力に包まれ、エクスパンスの精神的中心地となった。支配者達は偉大な存在となるために、犯罪者は贖罪のために、そして公正な者達は勇気を得るためにそこを訪れた。そういった者たちの訪問に、終わりは見えなかった。

languages.text: Sortie de l'isolement et de l'abandon, Rochepeste se transforma en centre spirituel des Étendues, acquérant richesse et pouvoir. Les souverains s'y rendaient pour assurer leur grandeur, les criminels pour faire pénitence, les vertueux pour y trouver un encouragement, et ils défilaient en une interminable procession.
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: Sortie de l'isolement et de l'abandon, Rochepeste se transforma en centre spirituel des Étendues, acquérant richesse et pouvoir. Les souverains s'y rendaient pour assurer leur grandeur, les pêcheurs pour faire pénitence, les vertueux pour y trouver un encouragement, et ils défilaient en une interminable procession.

languages.text: Libre de su aislamiento y su olvido, Rocainmunda se convirtió en el centro espiritual de la Extensión, cubierta de oro y poder. Los gobernantes la visitaban para que les ungieran con grandeza, los criminales para recibir la expiación y los justos para encontrar ánimos, y sus números no tenían fin.
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: Libre de su aislamiento y su olvido, Rocainmunda se convirtió en el centro espiritual de la Extensión, cubierta de oro y poder. Los gobernantes la visitaban para que les ungieran con grandeza, los pecadores para recibir la expiación y los justos para encontrar ánimos, y sus números no tenían fin.

languages.text: Nicht länger abgeschieden und vergessen, mauserte sich Foulstone zum spirituellen Zentrum der Ausdehnung, gehüllt in Gold und Macht. Herrscher begaben sich dort hin, um gekrönt zu werden. Sünder, um Buße zu tun. Und die Rechtschaffenen, um Mut zu finden. Und es gab endlos viele dieser Suchenden.
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: Nicht länger abgeschieden und vergessen, mauserte sich Foulstone zum spirituellen Zentrum der Ausdehnung, gehüllt in Gold und Macht. Herrscher wurden dort wegen ihrer Großartigkeit gesalbt, Sünder als Buße und die Rechtschaffenen zur Ermutigung – und ein Ende war nicht in Sicht.

languages.text: Artık izbe ve sahipsiz olmayan Menfurtaş, Enginlik'in ruhani merkezi olup bol bol altın ve güç kazandı. Hükümdarlar oraya azamet kazanmak, suçlular affedilmek, inananlarsa yüreklenmek için gittiler. Misafirlerin ardı arkası kesilmek bilmedi.
languages.original_text: No longer secluded and forlorn, Foulstone turned into the spiritual centre of the Expanse, clad in gold and power. Rulers went there to be anointed for greatness, criminals for penance, and the righteous for encouragement, and there was no end to them in sight.

traits.locale_text: Artık izbe ve sahipsiz olmayan Menfurtaş, Enginlik'in ruhani merkezi hâline geldi ve bol bol altın ve güç kazandı. Hükümdarlar oraya kaderlerinde azamet yazması için, suçlular affedilmek için ve inananlar yüreklenmek için gittiler ve bu misafirlerin ardı arkası kesilecek gibi de değildi.
